ygData.subject: Re: Rune I
ygData.msgSnippet: it s a good invulnerability spell. rune I takes 4 hits, dont know about the rest, but it s a good thing to have handy say if you are in a party and your cleric
ygData.messageBody:
it's a good invulnerability spell. rune I takes 4 hits, dont know about the
rest, but it's a good thing to have handy say if you are in a party and
your cleric runs out of mana, you can cast it on the guy who needs it so he
can run.

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 19th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
